content: 2 slip_stitch skip stitch the bpslipstich from round 5 2 slip_stitch 1 single_crochet * 4 times slip_stitch into top of chain to finish 13 14 notes inspiration was taken from sun and stars granny square by crochet cloudberry https //crochetcloudberry co uk/free-crochet-patterns/sun-and-stars-free-granny-square-pattern/ #google_vignette 15 using medium/worsted/size4 yarn the total yardage for the 12 squares was 295 yds 16 4 triangles you will need 4 triangle blocks for this bag each triangle block needs to have two holes in it for the bag s straps sizing the pattern is designed to make a triangle with the same side length as the radiant sun granny square 4 75 inch if your squares are a different size you will need to adjust the triangles to match using medium/worsted/size4 yarn the total yardage for the 4 triangles was 47 yards pattern - worsted / size 4 yarn - size 4 0mm hook - us terminology - in the same stitch - * * repeat round 1 magic_ring chain 3 counts as 1 single_crochet and ch2 single_crochet * chain 2 single_crochet * 2 times 17 round 2 turn chain 3 single_crochet chain 1 in first ch2 space single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet chain1 in center ch2 space single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in last ch2 space 18 round 3 turn chain 3 single_crochet in first ch2 space chain 5 skip first ch1 space single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet chain1 in center ch2 space single_crochet chain 1 in ch1 space single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in last ch2 space 19 round 4 turn chain 3 single_crochet chain 1 in first ch2 space * single_crochet chain 1 in ch1 space * 2 times single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet chain1 in center ch2 space single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet chain 1 in ch5 space single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in last ch2 space 20 round 5 turn chain 3 single_crochet chain 1 in first ch2 space * single_crochet chain 1 in ch1 space * 3 times single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet chain1 in center ch2 space * single_crochet chain 1 in ch1 space * 3 times single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in last ch2 space round 6 turn chain 3 single_crochet chain 1 in first ch2 space * single_crochet chain 1 in ch1 space * 4 times single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet chain1 in center ch2 space * single_crochet chain 1 in ch1 space * 4 times single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in last ch2 space round 7 turn 21 chain 3 single_crochet chain 1 in first ch2 space * single_crochet chain 1 in ch1 space * 5 times single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet chain1 in center ch2 space * single_crochet chain 1 in ch1 space * 4 times chain 4 single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in last ch2 space round 8 turn chain 3 single_crochet chain 1 in first ch2 space single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet chain 1 in ch5 space *
